member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.TranslationsResource.ListRequest.Format
member.summary: The format of the source text, in either HTML (default) or plain-text. A value of "html" indicates HTML and a value of "text" indicates plain-text.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.TranslationsResource.ListRequest.FormatEnum
member.summary: The format of the source text, in either HTML (default) or plain-text. A value of "html" indicates HTML and a value of "text" indicates plain-text.

member.summary: Specifies the input is in HTML

member.name: F:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.TranslationsResource.ListRequest.FormatEnum.Text

member.summary: The `model` type requested for this translation. Valid values are listed in public documentation.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.TranslationsResource.ListRequest.Source
member.summary: The language of the source text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support. If the source language is not specified, the API will attempt to identify the source language automatically and return it within the response.

member.summary: A detections contains detection results of several text

member.summary: The confidence of the detection result of this language.

member.summary: A boolean to indicate is the language detection result reliable.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.GetSupportedLanguagesRequest
member.summary: The request message for discovering supported languages.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.GetSupportedLanguagesRequest.Target
member.summary: The language to use to return localized, human readable names of supported languages.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.LanguagesListResponse.Languages
member.summary: List of source/target languages supported by the translation API. If target parameter is unspecified, the list is sorted by the ASCII code point order of the language code. If target parameter is specified, the list is sorted by the collation order of the language name in the target language.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.LanguagesResource.Language
member.summary: Supported language code, generally consisting of its ISO 639-1 identifier. (E.g. 'en', 'ja'). In certain cases, BCP-47 codes including language + region identifiers are returned (e.g. 'zh-TW' and 'zh- CH')

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.LanguagesResource.Name
member.summary: Human readable name of the language localized to the target language.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslateTextRequest
member.summary: The main translation request message for the Cloud Translation API.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslateTextRequest.Format
member.summary: The format of the source text, in either HTML (default) or plain-text. A value of "html" indicates HTML and a value of "text" indicates plain-text.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslateTextRequest.Model
member.summary: The `model` type requested for this translation. Valid values are listed in public documentation.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslateTextRequest.Q
member.summary: The input text to translate. Repeat this parameter to perform translation operations on multiple text inputs.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslateTextRequest.Source
member.summary: The language of the source text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support. If the source language is not specified, the API will attempt to identify the source language automatically and return it within the response.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslateTextRequest.Target
member.summary: The language to use for translation of the input text, set to one of the language codes listed in Language Support.

member.name: T:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslationsListResponse
member.summary: The main language translation response message.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslationsListResponse.Translations
member.summary: Translations contains list of translation results of given text

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslationsResource.DetectedSourceLanguage
member.summary: The source language of the initial request, detected automatically, if no source language was passed within the initial request. If the source language was passed, auto-detection of the language will not occur and this field will be empty.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslationsResource.Model
member.summary: The `model` type used for this translation. Valid values are listed in public documentation. Can be different from requested `model`. Present only if specific model type was explicitly requested.

member.name: P:Google.Apis.Translate.v2.Data.TranslationsResource.TranslatedText
member.summary: Text translated into the target language.
